excerpt.rendered:
The Gloversville Dining Collection’s stately presence will be the perfect addition to your dining room. The upholstered armchair is complemented by the Kikkar wood-framed side chair, each featuring a neutral-toned fabric and nailhead accent. The wood bench takes design inspiration from old-fashioned church pews, its curved arms giving way to the unfettered seating.

6 Seater Dining Table dimensions: 

  • width:  36-40 inches
  • length: 68-72 inches
  • height: 29-31 inches
  • Wood effect table with wood effect legs.
  • table top High Gloss finish

Chair:

  • Includes 6 chairs.
  • Size of each chair H40 inches, W22inches , D22 inches
  • Seat height 20 inches.
  • Solid wood frame with solid wood legs.
  • Fabric seat Juth.
  • Pre Assembled
  • The maximum user weight per chair is 130kg.

“Note: all our products are made to order.”
